entries.meaning: A large room used for dancing and banquets.
examples: The boy became volubly friendly and bubbling over with unexpected humour and high spirits. He tried to persuade Cicely to stay away from the ball-room for a fourth dance. Nobody would miss them, he explained.

verbs.description: ballroom (third-person singular simple present ballrooms, present participle ballrooming, simple past and past participle ballroomed)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To take part in ballroom dancing.
